thread.title: Netflix' 'Casting JonBenét' gets a chilling first trailer
thread.title_full: Netflix' 'Casting JonBenét' gets a chilling first trailer

author: USATODAY
title: Netflix' 'Casting JonBenét' gets a chilling first trailer
text:
Netflix''Casting JonBenét' gets a chilling first trailer Maeve McDermott , USATODAY Published 4:12 p.m. ET March 24, 2017 | Updated 1 hour ago 11 Shares 
The chilling saga of JonBenét Ramsey just got another on-screen adaptation, courtesy of Netflix' new documentary Casting JonBenét. 
The first trailer arrived on Thursday, a chilling clip that explains the conceit of the new show. Unlike other true-crime TV specials, like last year's two-part CBS docu-series The Case Of: JonBenét Ramsey , or Lifetime's scripted Who Killed JonBenét, Netflix' new project interviews actors from the Ramsey family's Boulder, Colorado, hometown auditioning to play the roles of JonBenét and her mother, father and brother, all of whom were suspects in the 9-year-old's murder on Dec. 26, 1996. 
As a result, there's a dramatic element to Casting JonBenét that takes the project beyond a straight documentary. 
Casting JonBenét premieres on Netflix on April 28. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2nNzTQV Most Popular
